comment:
>>39224341

“That's enough, you lot.” Donnel says. “Player versus player isn't enabled here, and both of you need all the hit points you can get.”

“Dorian, he's right. Quit being a prick.” Ayla hisses.

“I'm not.” Dorian points at Nel. “He's acting like a child.”

“Ohhhh...” Vyx groans—she's lying on her back a few feet away. “I forgot to eat.”

“What?” Aelriss shoots her a look between pity and confusion. “You moron... Didn't Kainzo tell you it would be a long r—“

“So... hungry...” The Gunner reaches for the sky with one hand, grasping at air before letting her arm fall limp. “I'm... fading.”

Tatsumaki looks at you, then shrugs.

Kainzo sighs. “Anyone? You're going to have to let us know now, so...”

What will you do?
> Write-in
> Suggest waiting to heal, or sending someone up to the market.
> Suggest investigating the area ahead, at least.
> Suggest that anyone who wants to leave speak up. You'll have to see about replacements.
name: Sylvetica
